content: crochet a comfy machine-washable and antimicrobial haven for your fur baby this cat and dog bed pattern uses single and double_crochet to create a sturdy yet cozy pet bed make the optional faux fur snuggle pad for extra cozy-factor pattern is written in two sizes to accommodate most small breeds of dogs and cats this ad-free pdf is formatted for easy printing and mobile viewing it includes a written pattern and several detailed photos small bed pictured measures 15 across best for pets under 8 pounds requires approx 800 yards of category 5 yarn medium bed measures 19 5 across best for pets under 14 pounds requires approx 1050 yards of category 5 yarn the sides on both sizes are approximately 7 tall you can easily modify the size of the pet bed with the notes provided in the pattern adjusting the size will also affect the amount of yarn needed for the project overall see additional details in overall pattern notes to determine sizing downloading - this listing is for the harbor pet bed crochet pattern pdf only pattern pdf will be available for instant download upon payment copyright/making finished items - thank you for sharing my patterns and tutorials when you do it helps support the blog and my ability to create more patterns which by the way i seriously love to do so really i mean it thank you you may make items to sell with this pattern/tutorial in exchange i ask that you link back to makeanddocrew com do not use my photos as your own sales photos do not distribute my patterns/templates as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind return policy - as this is a digital product i do not offer returns also check out our free crochet dog jacket pattern 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/crochet-dog-sweater-free-pattern/
